name: [AA] Kudos Regiment
description:
Alpha Authority Kudos Regiment; a highly strict and skilled branch specialised in law enforcement, problem-solving, specialist military combat and hostile detainment. The Kudos Regiment are available to solve problems that arise within the group, as well as proving a specialised combat force upon deployment. 

Chief:
Powerful122

Timezone: GMT/EST  

Servicemen Cap: 15  Reserves Cap: 20 

Application: https://forum.roblox.com/Forum/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=191310088

Handbook: https://forum.roblox.com/Forum/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=191309799

{}Must be Sergeant+ to be apart of the Kudos Regiment.{}
